entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
